column4: I'm not sure trinidad....   if your getting an ip, I just don't know what to tell you.  very sorry....  hopefully someone here can get ya going
trinidad_ : I don't see evidence of an IP assigned to wlan0 on ubuntu, only on windows.  The pastebin says the AP is "not associated".
are you looking at http://paste.ubuntu.com/251004/ ?   it's showing an ip of 169.254.11.184 for wlan0
169.254.11.184 is just a phony address that avahi made up for itself.  It was not really assigned.
